Commands.Veraero: Wind magic BRV attack  High turn rate  Increases White Mana by 2 (limit 7)  Becomes Verstone after use
Commands.Verstone: Earth magic BRV attack + HP attack  Increases White Mana by 3  Self: 1 turn Dualcast  Becomes Veraero after use
Commands.Verthunder: Thunder magic BRV attack  High turn rate  Increases Black Mana by 2 (limit 7)  Becomes Verfire after use
Commands.Verfire: Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack  Increases Black Mana by 3  Self: 1 turn Dualcast  Becomes Verthunder after use
Commands.Enchanted Riposte: Magic BRV attack + HP attack  Reduces White Mana, Black Mana by 1
Commands.Enchanted Redoublement: 3-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack  High turn rate  Self: 6 turns MAX BRV Up I  Reduces White Mana, Black Mana by 5
Commands.Jolt II Combo: 3-HIT magic BRV+HP attack.  Increases White and Black Mana by 2.  Extends the duration of Dualcast by 1 turn.  No Action Delay.  Doesn't increase turn count.  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count.

Artifacts.HP Damage Guard: Raises Defense Power by 20% after taking HP damage
Artifacts.Acceleration Boost: Increases the effects of Acceleration by 5%
Artifacts.Mighty Veraero: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Veraero by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Verthunder: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Verthunder by 10%

Passives.Veraero Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Veraero, Verstone and Verholy.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Verthunder Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Verthunder, Verfire and Verflare.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Veraero Charge: Increases the max uses of Veraero by 1.
Passives.Ability Speed High: Slightly reduces Action Delay when using abilities continuously.
Passives.Verthunder Charge: Increases the max uses of Verthunder by 1.
Passives.Acceleration: Slightly increases Max BRV and Attack for 3 turns after using Veraero and Verthunder.
Passives.Mighty Enchanted Redoublement: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Enchanted Redoublement
Passives.Veraero Extension: When using Veraero, Verstone:   Slight BRV damage boostUpon using Enchanted Redoublement:   Veraero, Verstone become Verholy (powerful magic BRV attack + HP attack)
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Verthunder Extension: When using Verthunder, Verfire:   Slight BRV damage boostUpon using Enchanted Redoublement:   Verthunder, Verfire become Verflare (powerful Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack)

Weapons.Mythrite Rapier CP: 15: Increases the potency of Veraero, Verstone, Verholy and Enchanted Riposte.Raises White Mana by one more point when using Veraero or Verstone.
Weapons.Shire Rapier CP: 35: Increases the potency of Verthunder, Verfire, Verflare and Enchanted Redoublement.Raises Black Mana by one more point when using Verthunder or Verfire.
